channel.description:

::npc
Reward if you give a right code ;-)
~ supra s

item.title: Spawn Objects - REP reward
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

heres my object command…

if (command.startsWith("poh")) { try {
int objectid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4,9)); int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10,12)); int face = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13,14));
int height = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15,16)); makeGlobalObject1(absX, absY,objectid, face,type,height); POHMapper(objectid,face,type);
} catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::poh 00001 10 1 1"); } }

heres the mapper incase you want them saved

public void POHMapper(int objectid,int face,int type) { try {
BufferedWriter bufferedwriter; bufferedwriter = null; bufferedwriter = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./data/writed/pohs.txt", true));
bufferedwriter.write((new StringBuilder()).append("makeGlobalObject(").append(absX).append(",").append(absY).append(",").append(objectid).append(",").append(face).append(",").append(type).append(");").toString());
bufferedwriter.newLine(); bufferedwriter.flush(); } catch(Exception e) { System.out.println("error writing to file..."); } }

hope this helps

Read full topic
